Package fr.r1r0r0.deltaengine.model.engines.network.server

Class Server

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
fr.r1r0r0.deltaengine.model.engines.network.server.Server
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class Server
extends java.lang.Thread
The server implementation for DeltaEngine. Creates a server using java Socket and handle them. It is possible to send or receive collections of objects with connected clients, or send data to specific client

  • Constructor Details

    • Server

      public Server​(int port) throws java.io.IOException
      Default constructor. Declare a new server with specified port, and prepare to receive new clients when server will be launched.
      Parameters:
      port - server port
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - exception from ServerSocket when it occurs
